definition: lower in range than tenor and higher than bass, the second lowest brass wind instrument
details:
adjective
- lower in range than tenor and higher than bass
= example: lower in range than tenor and higher than bass
noun
- the second lowest brass wind instrument
= synonyms: baritone horn
- the second lowest adult male singing voice
= synonyms: baritone voice
- a male singer
= synonyms: barytone
